name: Planet HighHop
description:
Planet HighHop is a short 2D platforming adventure. Play as a little astronaut who crash lands on a strange new planet.

~CONTROLS~

left arrow, A - move left

right arrow, D - move right

up arrow, W, space - jump

~~~

Traverse through Planet HighHop; an odd planet where the act of jumping has been turned on its head. The less time the jump button is held for, the higher the jump will be. See how high you can jump as you work to reunite with your ship.
